    • Method Detail

      • getItem

        public ItemInterface getItem(ItemGetWrapper wrap)
                      throws InvalidTokenException,
                             InvalidAdministratorException,
                             InvalidItemException
        Gets an Item from the database
        Parameters:
        wrap - See ItemGetWrapper
        Returns:
        Item that has a id that matched the one inputted
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - Throws if Token did not have an existing or matching authenticator or was expired
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if User does not have an authLevel equal to 2
        InvalidItemException - Throws if Item does not exist in the database

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<ItemInterface> getItems(Token token)
                                       throws InvalidTokenException,
                                              InvalidAdministratorException
        Gets all Items in the database
        Parameters:
        token - Token of User with authLevel equal to 2
        Returns:
        List<ItemInterface> that contains all Items in the database
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - Throws if Token did not have an existing or matching authenticator or was expired
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if User does not have an authLevel equal to 2

        Throws:

        InvalidItemException - Throws if Item does not exist in the database

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll(Token token)
               throws InvalidTokenException,
                      InvalidAdministratorException
        Deletes all Items from the database
        Parameters:
        token - Token of User with authLevel equal to 2
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - Throws if Token did not have an existing or matching authenticator or was expired
        InvalidAdministratorException - Throws if User does not have an authLevel equal to 2
